63 left_gripper_rotation = 0

66 husky_ptu_pan_position = 0
67 husky_ptu_tilt_position = 0

69 left_arm_client = None

74 LEFT_JOINT_NAMES = ['l_ur5_arm_shoulder_pan_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_shoulder_lift_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_elbow_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_wrist_1_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_wrist_2_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_wrist_3_joint']
75 RIGHT_JOINT_NAMES = ['r_ur5_arm_shoulder_pan_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_shoulder_lift_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_elbow_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_wrist_1_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_wrist_2_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_wrist_3_joint']
76 Q1 = [1.57, -1.57, 0, -1.57, 0, 0]
77 Q2 = [-1.57, -1.57, 0, -1.57, 0, 0]
78 Q3 = [-1.57, -0.2967, -2.79, -1.57, -0.5236, 0]
79 
80 RQ1 = [0, -1.57, 0, -1.5708, 0, 0]
81 RQ2 = [1.57, -1.57, 0, -1.57, 0, 0]
82 RQ3 = [1.57, -2.8449, 2.7925, -1.57, 0.5236, 0]

86 GRAB_IN = 1
87 GRAB_ABOVE = 2
88 GRAB_BELOW = 3
89 GRAB_FRONT = 4
90 CARRY = 5
91 DROP_OFF = 6
92 FRONTAL_GRAB = 7

94 LEFT_ARM = 0
95 RIGHT_ARM = 1

97 left_arm_joint_settings = [
98 [-1.02, -0.035, -0.55, -1.453, -2.22, -1.481],
99 [],
100 [],
101 [],
102 [],
103 [],
104 [] ]
105 left_arm_pose_settings = [
106 [0.899, 0.371, 0.0066, 0.268, 0.265, 0.6686, 0.6405] ]
107 left_arm_rpy_settings = [
108 [0.7739, -0.019, 1.605] ]
109 
110 right_arm_joint_settings = [[]]
111 right_arm_pose_settings = [[]]
112 right_arm_rpy_settings = [[]]

114 CONTROL_MODE = 0
115 LEFT_ARM_CONTROL = 1
116 RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL = 2
117 GRIPPER_CONTROL = 3

119 CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL = None
120 NUMBER_OF_JOINTS = 0
121 JOINT_LIMIT_RADIANS = 2
122 INDIVIDUAL_JOINT_CONTROL = 4

124 from subprocess import Popen, PIPE, STDOUT
125 
126 # Ignores anything with a greater then 3 hz frequency
127 def update_joint_selector(next=False, previous=False):
128  global CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL
129  incr = None
130  if next:
131  incr = 1
132  rospy.loginfo("Going to next joint")
133  elif previous:
134  incr = -1
135  rospy.loginfo("Going to previous joint")
136 
137  if CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL is None:
138  CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL = 0
139  elif CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL >= 0:
140  CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL = CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL + incr
141  if CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL >= 6:
142  CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL = None
143  if CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL <= 0:
144  CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL = None
145 
146  vibrate_controller()
147  rospy.loginfo("Currently controlling joint: " + str(CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL))
148 
149 # Needs to be locking
150 lock = False
151 def vibrate_controller():
152  global lock
153  if lock is False:
154  lock = True
155  process = Popen(["fftest", "/dev/input/event9"], stdout=PIPE, stdin=PIPE, stderr=STDOUT)
156  process.stdin.write("4\n0\n")
157  rospy.sleep(2.0)
158  process.stdin.write("-1\n")
159  lock = False
160 
161 # Returns False if it cannot move it past the joint range.
162 # Returns True if it can actuate it via MoveIt! (e.g its within the range)
163 def move_selected_joint(direction=1):
164  # Take current joint position from current mode/arm position by listening to group.
165  # Increment that joint position. If its above the limits, do not move it. Instead, vibrate the controller.
166  global JOINT_LIMIT_RADIANS
167  global interpreter
168  increment = 0.2 * direction
169  group = interpreter.get_active_group()
170  global left_arm_client
171  global right_arm_client
172  global LEFT_JOINT_NAMES
173  global RIGHT_JOINT_NAMES
174 
175  client = None
176  JOINTS = None
177 
178  if CONTROL_MODE is LEFT_ARM_CONTROL:
179  client = left_arm_client
180  JOINTS = LEFT_JOINT_NAMES
181  elif CONTROL_MODE is RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL:
182  client = right_arm_client
183  JOINTS = RIGHT_JOINT_NAMES
184  else:
185  rospy.loginfo("You must select an arm to control before commanding the joint modes")
186  return False
187 
188  Q1 = group.get_current_joint_values()
189 
190  current_position = Q1[CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL]
191  updated_position = current_position + increment
192  Q1[CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL] = updated_position
193 
194  if updated_position > 2.0:
195  updated_position = 2.0
196  vibrate_controller()
197  if updated_position < -2.0:
198  updated_position = -2.0
199  vibrate_controller()
200 
201  g = FollowJointTrajectoryGoal()
202  g.trajectory = JointTrajectory()
203  g.trajectory.joint_names = JOINTS
204  g.trajectory.points = [
205  JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=group.get_current_joint_values(), velocities=[0]*6, time_from_start=rospy.Duration(0.0)),
206  JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=Q1, velocities=[0]*6, time_from_start=rospy.Duration(1.3)) ]
207  client.send_goal(g)
208  rospy.loginfo("Moving joint " + group.get_joints()[CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL] + " to new position at " + str(updated_position))
209  try:
210  client.wait_for_result()
211  except KeyboardInterrupt:
212  client.cancel_goal()
213  raise
214 
215 def move_ptu(increment=0.2, tilt=False, pan=False, direction=1):
216  global ptu_cmd_publisher
217  speed = 0.1
218  increment = increment * direction
219  rospy.loginfo("Direction: " + str(increment))
220  joint_state_msg = JointState()
221  joint_state_msg.name = ['husky_ptu_pan', 'husky_ptu_tilt']
222  joint_state_msg.header.frame_id = 'husky_ptu'
223  # current position
224  rospy.loginfo("Current position pan: " + str(husky_ptu_pan_position) + " tilt: " + str(husky_ptu_tilt_position))
225  joint_state_msg.position = [husky_ptu_pan_position, husky_ptu_tilt_position]
226  joint_state_msg.effort = [0, 0]
227  joint_state_msg.header.seq = 0
228  # increment it
229  if pan:
230  joint_state_msg.position[0] = joint_state_msg.position[0] + increment
231  if tilt:
232  joint_state_msg.position[1] = joint_state_msg.position[1] + increment
233 
234  joint_state_msg.velocity = [speed, speed]
235  ptu_cmd_publisher.publish(joint_state_msg)
236 
237 
238 def go_to_predefined(conf):
239  # CONF 0 GRAB OUT
240  # CONF 1 GRAB IN
241  # CONF 2 GRAB ABOVE
242  # CONF 3 GRAB BELOW
243  # CONF 4 GRAB FRONT
244  # CONF 5 CARRY
245  # CONF 6 DROP_OFF
246  # CONF 7 FRONTAL GRAB
247 
248  global GRAB_OUT
249  global GRAB_IN
250  global GRAB_ABOVE
251  global GRAB_BELOW
252  global GRAB_FRONT
253  global CARRY
254  global DROP_OFF
255  global FRONTAL_GRAB
256  global interpreter
257  global LEFT_ARM
258  global RIGHT_ARM
259  global left_arm_joint_settings
260  global left_arm_pose_settings
261  global left_arm_rpy_settings
262  global right_arm_joint_settings
263  global right_arm_pose_settings
264  global right_arm_rpy_settings
265  global LEFT_ARM_CONTROL
266  global RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL
267  global CONTROL_MODE
268 
269  joint_settings = None
270  pose_settings = None
271  rpy_settings = None
272 
273  group = interpreter.get_active_group()
274  joints = group.get_joints()
275  arm = joints[0][0]
276  if arm is 'l':
277  joint_settings = left_arm_joint_settings
278  rpy_settings = left_arm_rpy_settings
279  pose_settings = left_arm_pose_settings
280  elif arm is 'r':
281  joint_settings = right_arm_joint_settings
282  rpy_settings = right_arm_rpy_settings
283  pose_settings = right_arm_pose_settings
284 
285  group.set_joint_value_target(joint_settings[conf])
286  group.set_rpy_target(rpy_settings[conf])
287  group.set_pose_target(pose_settings[conf])
288 
289  group.go()
290 
291 def move_home():
292  global interpreter
293  group = interpreter.get_active_group()
294  global left_arm_client
295  global right_arm_client
296  global CONTROL_MODE
297  global LEFT_ARM_CONTROL
298  global RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL
299  JOINTS = None
300  client = None
301 
302  global Q1
303  global Q2
304  global Q3
305  global RQ1
306  global RQ2
307  global RQ3
308 
309  HQ1 = None
310  HQ2 = None
311  HQ3 = None
312 
313  if CONTROL_MODE is LEFT_ARM_CONTROL:
314  client = left_arm_client
315  JOINTS = LEFT_JOINT_NAMES
316  HQ1 = Q1
317  HQ2 = Q2
318  HQ3 = Q3
319  elif CONTROL_MODE is RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL:
320  client = right_arm_client
321  JOINTS = RIGHT_JOINT_NAMES
322  HQ1 = RQ1
323  HQ2 = RQ2
324  HQ3 = RQ3
325 
326  g = FollowJointTrajectoryGoal()
327  g.trajectory = JointTrajectory()
328  g.trajectory.joint_names = JOINTS
329  g.trajectory.points = [
330  JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=group.get_current_joint_values(), velocities=[0]*6, time_from_start=rospy.Duration(0.0)),
331  JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=HQ1, velocities=[0]*6, time_from_start=rospy.Duration(2.0)),
332  JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=HQ2, velocities=[0]*6, time_from_start=rospy.Duration(3.0)),
333  JointTrajectoryPoint(positions=HQ3, velocities=[0]*6, time_from_start=rospy.Duration(6.0))]
334  client.send_goal(g)
335  rospy.loginfo("Moved arm to home position")
336  try:
337  client.wait_for_result()
338  except KeyboardInterrupt:
339  client.cancel_goal()
340  raise

342 
343 def genCommand(char, command):
344  """Update the command according to the character entered by the user."""
345 
346  if char == 'a':
347  command = SModelRobotOutput();
348  command.rACT = 1
349  command.rGTO = 1
350  command.rSPA = 255
351  command.rFRA = 150
352 
353  if char == 'r':
354  command = SModelRobotOutput();
355  command.rACT = 0
356 
357  if char == 'c':
358  command.rPRA = 255
359 
360  if char == 'o':
361  command.rPRA = 0
362 
363  if char == 'b':
364  command.rMOD = 0
365 
366  if char == 'p':
367  command.rMOD = 1
368 
369  if char == 'w':
370  command.rMOD = 2
371 
372  if char == 's':
373  command.rMOD = 3
374 
375  #If the command entered is a int, assign this value to rPRA
376  try:
377  command.rPRA = int(char)
378  if command.rPRA > 255:
379  command.rPRA = 255
380  if command.rPRA < 0:
381  command.rPRA = 0
382  except ValueError:
383  pass
384 
385  if char == 'f':
386  command.rSPA += 25
387  if command.rSPA > 255:
388  command.rSPA = 255
389 
390  if char == 'l':
391  command.rSPA -= 25
392  if command.rSPA < 0:
393  command.rSPA = 0
394 
395 
396  if char == 'i':
397  command.rFRA += 25
398  if command.rFRA > 255:
399  command.rFRA = 255
400 
401  if char == 'd':
402  command.rFRA -= 25
403  if command.rFRA < 0:
404  command.rFRA = 0
405 
406  return command
407 
408 def rotate_gripper(direction, which_gripper):
409  global left_gripper_rotation
410  global right_gripper_rotation
411 
412  rotation_step = 0.205
413 
414  g = FollowJointTrajectoryGoal()
415  g.trajectory = JointTrajectory()
416 
417  LEFT_ARM_JOINT_NAMES = ['l_ur5_arm_shoulder_pan_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_shoulder_lift_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_elbow_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_wrist_1_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_wrist_2_joint', 'l_ur5_arm_wrist_3_joint']
418  RIGHT_ARM_JOINT_NAMES = ['r_ur5_arm_shoulder_pan_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_shoulder_lift_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_elbow_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_wrist_1_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_wrist_2_joint', 'r_ur5_arm_wrist_3_joint']
419 
420  if which_gripper is "left":
421  g.trajectory.joint_names = LEFT_ARM_JOINT_NAMES
422  if which_gripper is "right":
423  g.trajectory.joint_names = RIGHT_ARM_JOINT_NAMES
424 
425 
426  global interpreter
427  current_group = interpreter.get_active_group()
428  joints = current_group.get_current_joint_values()
429  old_joints = joints
430  rospy.loginfo(joints)
431  global left_arm_client
432  global right_arm_client
433 
434  # use the direction to move the joint value up or down. it's in radians. so should always figure itself out? or maybe needed to be bounded?
435  if direction is "rotate_left":
436  # Decrease the joint position in radians.
437  val = joints[5]
438  val += abs(rotation_step)
439  joints[5] = val
440  if direction is "rotate_right":
441  val = joints[5]
442  val = val - abs(rotation_step)
443  joints[5] = val
444 
445  current_group.set_joint_value_target(joints)
446  current_group.go()
447 
448  return True
449 
450 def joy_callback(msg):
451  axes = msg.axes
452  buttons = msg.buttons
453  global left_arm
454  global right_arm
455  global left_gripper_closed
456  global right_gripper_closed
457  global gripper_cmd
458  global gripper_mode
459  global ptu_mode
460  global LEFT_ARM_CONTROL
461  global CONTROL_MODE
462  global RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL
463  global GRIPPER_CONTROL
464 
465  dpad_right = axes[6] < 0
466  dpad_left = axes[6] > 0
467  dpad_down = axes[7] < 0
468  dpad_up = axes[7] > 0
469 
470  left_joy_up = axes[1] > 0
471  left_joy_down = axes[1] < 0
472  left_joy_left = axes[0] > 0
473  left_joy_right = axes[0] < 0
474 
475  left_joy_directions = [left_joy_up, left_joy_down, left_joy_left, left_joy_right]
476 
477  right_joy_up = axes[4] > 0
478  right_joy_down = axes[4] < 0
479  right_joy_left = axes[3] > 0
480  right_joy_right = axes[3] < 0
481 
482  right_joystick_pressed = (buttons[10] == 1)
483  left_joy_pressed = (buttons[9] == 1)
484 
485  dx = 0.05
486  fast_driving = (buttons[2] > 0 and (left_joy_up or left_joy_down or left_joy_left or left_joy_right))
487  slow_driving = (buttons[0] > 0 and (left_joy_up or left_joy_down or left_joy_left or left_joy_right))
488  is_driving = slow_driving or fast_driving
489  # Dont do anything if the joy command is set to drive.
490  if is_driving:
491  return False
492 
493  if buttons[6]:
494  # stow arms
495  move_home()
496  return
497 
498  a = msg.header.seq % 7
499  if buttons[3] and (a == 0):
500  update_joint_selector(next=True)
501 
502  if buttons[2] and (a == 0):
503  update_joint_selector(previous=True)
504 
505  if dpad_left:
506  rospy.loginfo("Panning left")
507  move_ptu(pan=True, direction=1)
508  if dpad_right:
509  rospy.loginfo("Panning right")
510  move_ptu(pan=True, direction=-1)
511  if dpad_down:
512  rospy.loginfo("Tilting down")
513  move_ptu(tilt=True, direction=-1)
514  if dpad_up:
515  rospy.loginfo("Tilting up")
516  move_ptu(tilt=True, direction=1)
517 
518  # Changing arm control modes. Only one arm controlled at a time.
519  if axes[2] < 0:
520  interpreter.execute("use left_arm")
521  rospy.loginfo("MODE: LEFT ARM CONTROL MODE")
522  CONTROL_MODE = LEFT_ARM_CONTROL
523  vibrate_controller()
524  return True
525  if axes[5] < 0:
526  interpreter.execute("use right_arm")
527  CONTROL_MODE = RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL
528  rospy.loginfo("MODE: RIGHT ARM CONTROL MODE")
529  vibrate_controller()
530  return True
531  # Left trigger pressed, send gripper close
532  if buttons[4]:
533  if left_gripper_closed:
534  open_gripper = genCommand("o", gripper_cmd)
535  l_gripper_publisher.publish(open_gripper)
536  rospy.sleep(2)
537  rospy.loginfo("Opening left gripper")
538  left_gripper_closed = False
539  else:
540  close_gripper = genCommand("c", gripper_cmd)
541  l_gripper_publisher.publish(close_gripper)
542  rospy.sleep(2)
543  left_gripper_closed = True
544  rospy.loginfo("Closing left gripper")
545  return True
546  if buttons[5]:
547  if right_gripper_closed:
548  open_gripper = genCommand("o", gripper_cmd)
549  r_gripper_publisher.publish(open_gripper)
550  rospy.sleep(0.5)
551  right_gripper_closed = False
552  rospy.loginfo("Opening right gripper")
553  else:
554  close_gripper = genCommand("c", gripper_cmd)
555  r_gripper_publisher.publish(close_gripper)
556  rospy.sleep(0.5)
557  right_gripper_closed = True
558  rospy.loginfo("Closing right gripper")
559  return True
560  if buttons[1]:
561  CONTROL_MODE = GRIPPER_CONTROL
562  if not gripper_mode:
563  gripper_mode = True
564  vibrate_controller()
565  else:
566  gripper_mode = False
567 
568  global GRAB_OUT
569  global GRAB_IN
570  global GRAB_FORWARD
571  global GRAB_ABOVE
572  global GRAB_BELOW
573  global INDIVIDUAL_JOINT_CONTROL
574  global CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL
575 
576  # Check if LT is pressed
577  if CONTROL_MODE is LEFT_ARM_CONTROL and (CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL is None):
578  # Left arm is pressed.
579  if left_joy_up:
580  move_arm("forward", dx)
581  elif left_joy_down:
582  move_arm("back", dx)
583  elif left_joy_left:
584  move_arm("left", dx)
585  elif left_joy_right:
586  move_arm("right", dx)
587  elif right_joy_up:
588  move_arm("up", dx)
589  elif right_joy_down:
590  move_arm("down", dx)
591  elif CONTROL_MODE is RIGHT_ARM_CONTROL and (CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL is None):
592  # Right arm is pressed
593  if left_joy_up:
594  move_arm("forward", dx)
595  if left_joy_down:
596  move_arm("back", dx)
597  if left_joy_left:
598  move_arm("left", dx)
599  if left_joy_right:
600  move_arm("right", dx)
601  if right_joy_up:
602  move_arm("up", dx)
603  if right_joy_down:
604  move_arm("down", dx)
605  elif CONTROL_MODE is GRIPPER_CONTROL and (CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL is None):
606  arm = ""
607  if left_arm:
608  arm = "left"
609  elif right_arm:
610  arm = "right"
611  if left_joy_left:
612  go_to_predefined(GRAB_OUT)
613  elif left_joy_right:
614  go_to_predefined(GRAB_IN)
615  elif left_joy_up:
616  go_to_predefined(GRAB_ABOVE)
617  elif left_joy_down:
618  go_to_predefined(GRAB_BELOW)
619  elif left_joy_pressed:
620  go_to_predefined(GRAB_FORWARD)
621  elif right_joy_left:
622  rotate_gripper("rotate_left", arm)
623  elif right_joy_right:
624  rotate_gripper("rotate_right", arm)
625  elif CURRENT_JOINT_CONTROL >= 0:
626  if right_joy_left:
627  move_selected_joint(direction=1)
628  if right_joy_right:
629  move_selected_joint(direction=-1)
630  elif ptu_mode:
631  return True
632 
633 def jointstate_callback(msg):
634  # Get current js for ptu
635  global husky_ptu_tilt_position
636  global husky_ptu_pan_position
637  joints = msg.name
638  husky_ptu_pan_position = msg.position[0]
639  husky_ptu_tilt_position = msg.position[1]
640 
641 def move_arm(direction, distance):
642  global interpreter
